articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Ice layer thinner than DNA strand is blinding Europe's Euclid telescope - India Today
articles.description: The problem if not solved could lead to major observational issues as the telescope investigates the nature of the dark Universe
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) is working hard to find a solution to a problem that could ruin observations of the universe made by the Euclid telescope in space. A layer of water ice, thinner than … [+2699 chars]
